title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
OB: When clicking on any link in the welcome page of build 20021001, the selected link is not visually highlighted when the user returns to the welcome page.
EB: The selected link should be visually highlighted to provide more context to the user when they return to the welcome page.
SR: Implement the feature to visually highlight the selected link when the user clicks on it in the welcome page of build 20021001.
